fields.description:
I need to set selected colour to the list view rows . In order to achieve that I need to set touchEnabled property of children views of the item template to false  in Android(It works perfectly in IOS without setting touchEnabled property). It works in titanium sdk 3.2. After I updated titanium sdk to 3.4, layout property not working while i set touch enabled false to the children view of an item template

<ListView id="listViewSample" class="contentViewWithHeaderAndFooter"  defaultItemTemplate="template" onItemclick="openDetails">
	<Templates>
		<ItemTemplate name="template" id="infoTemplate" >
			<View width="Ti.UI.FILL" height="Ti.UI.SIZE"  layout="vertical" touchEnabled="false">
				<View id="mainView" width="Ti.UI.FILL" height="Ti.UI.SIZE" top= "10dp"	bottom= "10dp" touchEnabled="false">
					<View id="detailsView" width="Ti.UI.FILL" height="Ti.UI.SIZE" left= "15dp"	right= "40dp" touchEnabled="false">
						<Label bindId="textLabel" id="textLabel" height="Ti.UI.SIZE" touchEnabled="false"/>
					</View>
					<ImageView  class="arrow" width="Ti.UI.SIZE" height="Ti.UI.SIZE"/>
				</View>
				<View width="Ti.UI.FILL" height="Ti.UI.SIZE" touchEnabled="false" >
					<ImageView class="cellSeperatorImage"  ></ImageView>
				</View>
			</View>
		</ItemTemplate>
	</Templates>
	<ListSection id="section">
		<ListItem  />
	</ListSection>
</ListView>
this is the code i'm using
fields.summary: touch enabled false to a view in listview makes layout not working in titanium sdk 3.4

comments.body:
Hi,

Please provide a runnable simple test case to reproduce your problem. That will be really helpful to address the problem. Thanks

Regards,
Shuo
